product_name: Maui Jim Sugar Beach Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses protect your eyes and enhance your view with vibrant colors and Maui Jim PolarizedPlus2(R) technology. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus2 lenses blocks glare and UV from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Extremely impact-resistant, lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Lenses and frames are treated for use in saltwater. Anticorrosive nickel/silver alloy hinges enhance durability. Flexible rubber nose pads prevent slippage. Rootbeer frames feature bronze lenses and offer excellent contrast; perfect for low-light conditions, or for those who like a subtle bronze hue for everyday wear. Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses include a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses protect your eyes and enhance your view with vibrant colors and Maui Jim PolarizedPlus2(R) technology.
